description: LOOKING FOR A QUIET TOWN WITH ALL THE SERVICES? ARE YOU LOOKING FOR A HOUSE AT A GOOD PRICE TO PUT IT TO YOUR TASTE? Do not look any further! We offer you this house with 127 meters with endless possibilities. The house is accessed through a patio shared with 4 neighbors and has another 25-meter totally private patio. It is distributed over two floors plus a cave. On the ground floor there is the bathroom, the kitchen and two more rooms, which could be left open-plan and converted into a living room with a kitchenette. Through the stairs, on the second floor, we have an open-plan attic and another space for one more bedroom. The cave is accessed through an external door. It has height and width, so again, there are several options to adapt this space to whatever you can think of. Recently, checks have been made both on the structure and foundation, as well as on the roof, beams, and walls.. . The water and electricity meter are recent. Areas of both the ceiling and the floor have been chopped to make checks. The idea was to cut the ceiling and leave the vaults with the original wooden beams since they are in GOOD CONDITION. IT IS A PERFECT OPPORTUNITY TO TURN IT INTO YOUR IDEAL HOME. If you have any questions, want to see ideas on how to leave it or want to make a visit, do not hesitate to contact us. Belmonte de Tajo is a Spanish municipality and town in the southeast of the Community of Madrid. The municipal term, located in the region of Las Vegas and in the Alcarria de Chinchón, has a population of 1769 inhabitants. It has three bus lines, one of them linking with the capital, specifically, at the Conde de Casal station. These lines are: 337Madrid (Count of Casal) - Chinchón - Valdelaguna 350C Arganda del Rey (Hospital) – Belmonte de Tajo 430Aranjuez – Villarejo de Salvanés In addition, Belmonte has educational centers (C. AND. I. P. Belmonte de Tajo and "Las Brisas" Early Childhood Education School), Pharmacy, Playgrounds, supermarkets and a wide range of jobs in the industrial zone. [IW].
